content.content: Hey all, Debt ceilings of ETH-A and WBTC-A  are close to full utilization and @SebVentures, @hexonaut, @LongForWisdom and myself felt that an urgent executive to increase the debt ceiling is needed. On-chain polls were released today about proposed debt ceiling adjustments based on a Signal Request made last week. Based on the full support of the proposal by the community and the urgency of debt ceiling increase we feel that an urgent executive vote with the same proposed DC changes is preferred for ETH-A and WBTC-A. Proposed Debt Ceiling Adjustments: ETH-A DC increase to 1,000,000,000 DAI WBTC-A DC increase to 210,000,000 DAI @hexonaut who was delegated by Smart Contract Domain will prepare an executive spell shortly and will be available online once the current executive spell passes.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an urgent proposal to increase the debt ceiling of ETH-A and WBTC-A. The author, along with other members, have proposed debt ceiling adjustments and are seeking an urgent executive vote. The post also mentions that on-chain polls were released and the proposal has received full support from the community. The post does not contain any advertising or collaboration requests.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
